description:
It`s first year class S`s first practical exam. Yayoi intends to take first place, and when she hears Logicalists currently on active duty are going to participate in the practical exam, she puts even more effort into her goal. However, her biggest rival Nina seems to be more concerned about Lion. And so the practical exam starts, filled with ups and downs. Who will get first place?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Journal of a Thousand Miles Begins with Effort
Senri no Michi mo Doryoku kara
